welcome: Welcome to Simple AI (simple-ai.io)! ğŸš€ Simple AI is an AI chat application powered by OpenAI's GPT-4 Turbo, integrated with WolframAlpha (Enhanced Knowledge & Mathematics), Midjourney (High Quality Image Generation), and Vectara (Vector Database Indexing), among other practical tools. It offers a minimalistic design packed with rich features, faster operations and a more professional user experience, making it an excellent ChatGPT alternative. quick_start_0: Simple AI operates using a command interface, shortcuts and gestures. Commands all begin with `:` (half-width colon).
quick_start_1:
Before starting to use, take 10s to register a user with command `:user add [username] [email] [password?]`, and a 30K free tokens will be given to you.ğŸ
Note: Do not include the brackets in your command.âœ…
For example, `:user add john john@example.com ********`.ğŸ”‘
quick_start_2: To log in, use the command `:login [username] [password]`.
quick_start_3: If you forgot your password, reset it using the command `:user reset pass [username] [email]`.ğŸ†˜
quick_start_4: To access the documentation and confirm usage, click the dot (â€¢) in the screen corner.ğŸ“„
